actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps and to prohibit the grant, sale, or loan of ordnance material for the use of high school age students by the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Repeals the authorization for Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps. Prohibits the loan or sale of specified obsolete and excess military ordance material to educational institutions other than those of higher learning.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps and to prohibit the grant, sale, or loan of ordnance material for the use of high school age students by the Armed Forces.
